child_plan_rest.title: We have different child plans available. Please find the one that best suits your needs from the following options.

data.title: Himalayan Child Endowment Plan
data.subtitle: You can find the key features of this plan in view details section.

listitem.text: • Plan Name: Child Endowment life Assurance Plan
• Minimum Sum Assured: 50,000/-
• Maximum Sum Assured: According to the income of Life Assurance
• Entry Age (Child): (New Born) 0 Years to 13Years
• Maximum entry age child/ (Proposer): 13 Years to 65 Years
• Maximum maturity age child/proposer: 18 years/70 years
• Term: min. 5 Years to max. 18 Years
• Mode of paying method: Monthly, Quarterly, half Yearly, Yearly
• Medical Requirement: As per Company Rule
• Age Calculation Method: Age Nearer Birthday
• Accidental Benefit: PWB/PTD Available up to Max. 1,00,00,000/-
• Loan Facility: 2 year complete premium paid should be require for taking loan.

• RISK COMMENCEMENT: Risk of the Child will be commence either 2 Years after the date of commencement or from the policy anniversary falling immediately after the child completing 6 years of age, whichever is later.
• OTHER FACILITIES: Surrender value, Paid up Value as per policy.

• POLICY BENEFITS: 1. On the death of Child before commencement of risk
2. On the Death of Child After commencement of Risk
3. Premium Waiver Benefit
4. Monthly Income Benefits

data.title: Himalayan Life Swarnim Jeewan Beema
data.subtitle: This plan is specially designed to meet the increasing educational, marriage and other needs of growing children.

Details.title: Himalayan Life Swarnim Jeewan Beema
Details.subtitle: Key Features
Details.paragraph: This plan is specially designed to meet the increasing educational, marriage and other needs of growing children. At HimalayaneLife, we understand the value of securing child's future and offer a plan 'PrimeLife Swarnim' to help secure a bright future for children.</br>• Insurance term can be determined as per requirement</br>• Premium payment frequency can be chosen as per convenience</br>• Sum insured can be chosen as per customer's need

listitem.text: • Minimum Age of Child: 0 Years
• Maximum Age of Child: 15 years nearest birthday
• Minimum Age of Prosper: 18 years
• Maximum Age of Propose: 60 years
• Maximum Maturity Age of Prosper: 60 years
• Minimum Policy Term: 10 Years
• Maximum Policy Term: 30 Years
• Minimum Sum Assured: Rs. 50,000
• Maximum Sum Assured: Rs. 5,000,000
• Premium Paying Term: Equal to policy term
• Premium Payment Frequency: Yearly, Half Yearly, Quarterly & Monthly
• At the time of Maturity: Full Sum Assured plus bonus
• After commnecement of Risk: Full Sum Assured plus Bonus
• Before commnecement of Risk: Refund of full premium paid after deducting riders premium, if any
Premium Waiver Benefit (PWB) and Monthly Incime Benefit (MIB)
MIB/PWB coverage is for proposer (i.e child's father or mother) with following features:
• Minimum Rider Sum Assured: NPR 50,000
• Maximum Rider Sum Assured: NPR 50,00,000
• Minimum Rider Term: 2 years
• Maximum Rider Term: 16 - age of child
• Minimum Entry Age of Proposer: 18 Years
• Maximum Entry Age of Proposer: 58 Years
• Premium Payment Frequency: Yearly, Half Yearly, Quarterly and Monthly

whole life_plan_rest.title: We have different whole life plans available. Please find the one that best suits your needs from the following options.

data.title: Himalayan Endowment Cum Whole Life Insurance Plan
data.subtitle: This is an extension of the term insurance whereby the Assured amount is payable only on death of the assured whenever that may occur at the time of maturity.
data.interest: Himalayan Endowment Cum Whole Life Insurance Plan

Details.interest: Himalayan Endowment Cum Whole Life Insurance Plan
Details.title: Himalayan Endowment Cum Whole Life Insurance Plan
Details.subtitle: Key Features
Details.paragraph: This is an extension of the term insurance whereby the Assured amount is payable only on death of the assured whenever that may occur at the time of maturity. In this case, the premium is payable up to a stipulated period by insured sum is payable only upon the death of the insured to his nominee.

listitem.text: • Entry Age: 11 to 65 Years
• Maximum age at the end of premium paying term: 70 years
• Term: min. 5 Years to max. 59 Years
• Maximum Policy Term: 20 Years
• Minimum Sum Assured: Rs. 100,000
• Maximum Sum Assured: According to the income of Life Assurance
• Mode of paying method: Monthly, Quarterly, half Yearly, Yearly
• Medical Requirement: As per Company Rule
• Age Calculation Method: Age Nearer Birthday
• Loan Facility: 2 year complete premium paid should be require for taking loan
SPECIAL FEATURES

• Rebate on large Sum Assured:
Sum Assured: 2,00,000 /- to 2,99,999 /- Rebate Rs. 1/-
Sum Assured: 3,00,000 /- & Above Rebate Rs. 2/-

• Rebate on Premium Paying Terms:
Yearly: 2 % Rebate
Half Yearly: 1 % Rebate
Quaterly: NIL
Monthly: Additional 5 % Rebate

OTHER FACILITIES:
1. Loan Facility: 2-year complete premium paid should be required for getting a Policyholder loan.
2. Surrender value, Paid-up Value as per policy.
3. Policy Mature Benefit: Sum Assured + Accrued Bonus
4. Survival Benefits at age of 100 years: Sum Assured
5. Death Benefits: Within Term Period - Sum Assured + Accrued Bonus up to Term Period during Death.
6. Death Benefits after policy mature: Sum Assured.
• Accidental Death benefits: Sum Assured + Additional Sum Assured up to Max. 1 crore or Actual sum assured whichever is lower. + Accrued bonus up to Term Period during Death.

• PTD/ PWB Benefits:Waiver of Premium during term period of the policy after the total permanent disability occurs and monthly income benefits (MIB) be provided provide to policyholder equals to Sum Assured up to 120 months instalment basis and in case of remaining term to maturity be less than 120 months the balancing instalment will be payable in a lump sum on maturity or at death, if earlier.

data.title: Himalayan Limited Payment (Endowment Cum Whole Life) Plan
data.subtitle: Limited Payment Endowment Cum Whole Life Plan covers the features of both limited payment and whole life. It is a participating life product.
data.interest: Himalayan Limited Payment (Endowment Cum Whole Life) Plan

Details.interest: Himalayan Limited Payment (Endowment Cum Whole Life) Plan
Details.title: Himalayan Limited Payment (Endowment Cum Whole Life) Plan
Details.subtitle: Key Features
Details.paragraph: In this policy, policyholders may pay premium for the limited of time and will cover risk for the whole life. The policyholder may choose the various premium paying term based on policy term. Premium paying term will be lesser than the policy term.

listitem.text: • Minimum Sum Assured: 50,000/-
• Maximum Sum Assured: No limit (As per Income Source)
• Entry Age: 11 to 65 Years
• Policy Term: 5 to 30 Years
• Maximum Maturity Age: 70 Years
• Rider Benefits: ADB, MIB, PWB

• Survival Benefit:
Sum Assured and Vested Bonus up to Maturity Period
Survival to Maturity Date (Age 100 Years)
Sum Assured Only

• Death Benefit within Policy Term Period:
Sum Assured and Vested Bonus

• Death Benefit after Policy Maturity :
Sum Assured Only

• Other facilities :
Surrender Value
Policy holder Loan
Tax benefit As per ITA,058

• Death Benefit due to Accident:
Additional amount equal to Sum Assured or Rs. 1,00,00,000/- whichever is lower
Rider Benefits ADB Covers upto Age 70 Years

• TPD Benefit due to Accident:
Sum Assured is payable in 120 monthly installment, Balancing installment shall bepayable in lump sum on maturity or at death.

data.title: Himalayan Life Jeewan Surakshya
data.subtitle: This policy  provides few details about the new term. To know more information click on view details below.

Details.title: Himalayan Life Jeewan Surakshya
Details.subtitle: Key Features
Details.paragraph: • Insurance term can be determined as per requirement</br>• Premium payment frequency can be chosen as per convenience</br>• Sum insured can be chosen as per customer’s need

listitem.text: • Minimum Entry Age: 16 Years
• Maximum Entry Age: 55 years
• Maximum Maturity Age: 70 years
• Minimum Policy Term: 15 Years
• Maximum Policy Term: 54 Years
• Minimum Sum Assured: Rs. 100,000
• Maximum Sum Assured: No limit
• Premium Paying Term: Equal to policy term
• Premium Payment Frequency: Yearly, Half Yearly, Quarterly & Monthly
• Maturity Benefits: Full Sum Assured plus Bonus
• Death Before Maturity: Basic Sum Assured plus Vested Bonus
• Death after Maturity: Basic Sum Assured or Basic Sum Assured plus Accidental Death Benefit upto age 70, in case of accidental death only
• Accidental Death Benefit (ADB)
• (Equal to basic sum assured or maximum NPR. 10,000,000 whichever is lower)

• Critical Illness (CI) – This is optional rider coverage which shall be allowed to take our existing policyholders in the condition of medical fitness with effect from the policy anniversary date in all the product portfolio. However, the Company has sole discretion to accept or reject the application. The medical cost shall be borne by an applicant whatsoever. The maximum rider sum assured shall be NPR. 25,00,000 or actual basic sum assured whichever is lower.

• Personal Accident (PA) – This is optional rider coverage which offers immense benefits during the policy period. This rider shall be allowed to take new policy holder as well as existing policy holders with effect from the policy anniversary date by paying additional rider premium. The maximum rider sum assured shall be NPR. 50,00,000 or actual basic sum assured whichever is lower.

data.title: Himalayan Barshik Nagad Firta Jeevan Beema Yojana (Annual Cash Back Policy)
data.subtitle: This policy is an anticipated endowment policy which gives money back every year after one year till maturity at the rate of 4% of the sum assured.
data.interest: Himalayan Barshik Nagad Firta Jeevan Beema Yojana (Annual Cash Back Policy)

Details.interest: Himalayan Barshik Nagad Firta Jeevan Beema Yojana (Annual Cash Back Policy)
Details.title: Details of Himalayan Barshik Nagad Firta Jeevan Beema Yojana (Annual Cash Back Policy)
Details.subtitle: Key Features
Details.paragraph: This policy is an anticipated endowment policy which gives money back every year after one year till maturity at the rate of 4% of the sum assured. This innovative product was first introduced by Himalayan Life Insurance LTD in considerations of the policy holders who need money every year.

• Sum Assured plus bonus will be paid to nominee person in case of death of the assured during policy term

• Accidental Death Benefit
• Permanent Total Disability Benefit

data.title: Himalayan Jeewan Upahar
data.subtitle: Himalayan Life Insurance Company has introduced an innovative new product as “Himalayan Jeevan Upahar Plan”, money back cum endowment plan with riders benefit as optional.

Details.title: Details of Himalayan Jeewan Upahar
Details.subtitle: Key Features
Details.paragraph: Himalayan Life Insurance Company has introduced an innovative new product as Himalayan Jeevan Upahar Plan, money back cum endowment plan with riders benefit as optional. The product is developed to cover high net worth people who are out of the ring of life insurance.</br> The product offered immense return at the time of Maturity as well as covers high death benefit during policy period. The attractiveness of this product is a policyholder gets an equal sum assured  endowment policy at the first policy anniversary date of master policy without any cost, as Upahar.</br> This is a tremendously unique and special plan that offers multiple covers by providing UPAHAR POLICY (pure endowment) equal to the basic sum of PJUP plan. Both the policies mature at the same date with extensive benefits.

listitem.text: PJUP
• Minimum Entry Age: 16 Years
• Maximum Entry Age: 54 Years
• Maximum Maturity Age: 70 Years
• Minimum/Maximum Policy Term: 16 Years
• Minimum Sum Assured: 500,000 NPR
• Minimum Sum Assured: -
UPAHAR
• Minimum Entry Age: 17 Years
• Maximum Entry Age: 55 Years
• Maximum Maturity Age: 70 Years
• Minimum/Maximum Policy Term: 15 Years
• Minimum/Maximum Sum Assured: As per Original policy Sum Assure

• At the time of Maturity: 25% of the sum assured on the base plan and 100% basic sum assured of the UPAHAR plan plus earned bonuses on both the policies shall be paid to assured i.e.,125% of the basic sum and 200% of bonus.

• Death before maturity: 100% sum of the base plan plus earned bonus shall be paid within the first policy anniversary. 100% sum of the base plan and 100% sum of the UPAHAR plan plus earned bonuses on both the policies shall be paid after the first policy anniversary on the basis of the terms and conditions of the policy.
• Accidental Death Benefit (ADB): (Equal to basic sum assured or maximum NPR. 10,000,000 which ever is less) Upto age 70 Years
• Total Permanent Disability and Premium Waiver (TPD/PW) (Equal to basic sum assured or maximum NPR. 10,00,000 which ever is less) Upto age 70 Years
• Critical Illness (CI):Critical Illness Cover up to NPR. 25 Lakh. Upto age 65 Years
• Personal Accident Benifit (PAB) Personal accident and disabilities with Medical expenses cover up to NPR. 50 Lakh. Upto age 65 Years

Details.title: Details of Himalayan Life Sulav Money Back
Details.subtitle: Key Features
Details.paragraph: Himalayan Life  Sulav Jeevan Beema Insurance Scheme is a new kind of money back-life insurance scheme. Insured during this insurance plan after completing sometime of insurance period get some percentage of Insured amount is refunded, which helps you to fulfill your daily need works.100 percentage of insurance risk will be covered after the remaining term. The mind delivers much when insurance gets an over-all bonus amount.

Details.title: Himalayan Shuvalabh
Details.subtitle: Key Features
Details.paragraph: This plan offers the Guaranteed Bonus, multiple risk covers as well as loyalty additions at the policy maturity.

listitem.text: • Minimum Entry Age: 18 Years
• Maximum Entry Age: 60 years
• Minimum Policy Term: 12 Years
• Maximum Policy Term: 15 Years
• Minimum Sum Assured: Rs. 100,000
• Maximum Sum Assured: No Limit
• Maximum Maturity Age: 75 Years
• Premium Paying Term: Single or 6/8
• Premium Payment Frequency : Yearly, Half Yearly & Single
Benefits on SINGLE Payment

• At the time of Maturity:
100% base sum assured plus Rs. 40/1000 guaranteed bonus plus additional loyalty bonus 15/1000 and 30/1000 of the base sum assured for 12 & 15 Years policy terms respectively

• Death before maturity:
{Base sum assured in case of death in first 2 years, 125% of base sum assured in case of death between year 3 and 5 & 150% of base sum in case of death after 5 years} + Accured Guaranteed bonus Rs. 40/1000 SA as at the date of death.
Benefits on REGULAR Payment:

• At the time of Maturity:
100% base sum assured plus Rs. 60/1000 guaranteed bonus plus additional loyalty bonus 25% and 30% of the base sum assured for 12 & 15 Years policy terms respectively

• Death before maturity:
{Base sum assured in case of death in first 2 years, 150% of base sum assured in case of death between year 3 and 5 & 200% of base sum in case of death after 5 years} + Accured Guaranteed bonus Rs. 60/1000 SA as at the date of death
• Accidental Death Benefit (ADB) and Total Permanent Disability and Premium Waiver  (TPD/PW) (Equal to basic sum assured or maximum NPR. 10,000,000 which ever is less)
• Critical Illness Cover up to NPR. 25 Lakh.
• Personal accident and disabilities with Medical expenses cover up to NPR. 50 Lakh.

• Accidental Death Benefit (ADB), Total Permanent Disability and Premium Waiver  (TPD/PW)
• (Equal to basic sum assured or maximum NPR. 10,000,000 whichever is lower)

• Critical Illness (CI) – This is optional rider coverage which shall be allowed to take our existing policyholders in the condition of medical fitness with effect from the policy anniversary date in all the product portfolio. However, the Company has sole discretion to accept or reject the application. The medical cost shall be borne by an applicant whatsoever. The maximum rider sum assured shall be NPR. 25,00,000 or actual basic sum assured whichever is lower

• Personal Accident (PA) – This is optional rider coverage which offers immense benefits during the policy period. This rider shall be allowed to take new policy holder as well as existing policy holders with effect from the policy anniversary date by paying additional rider premium. The maximum rider sum assured shall be NPR. 50,00,000 or actual basic sum assured whichever is lower

data.title: Himalayan Life Single And Limited Payment
data.subtitle: Himalayan Life Single and Limited Payment Plan is designed to the people who wish to pay the premium in lump sum basis and who wish to pay premium for the limited payment.
data.interest: Himalayan Life Single And Limited Payment

Details.interest: Himalayan Life Single And Limited Payment
Details.title: Himalayan Life Single And Limited Payment
Details.subtitle: Key Features
Details.paragraph: Himalayan Life Single and Limited Payment Plan is designed to the people who wish to pay the premium in lump sum basis and who wish to pay premium for the limited payment.</br>• Premium can be paid in lump sum basis as a single payment or for the desired period</br>• Upon maturity of policy, Sum assured and vested bonus will be paid</br>• In case of death of the insured within the premium paying term, subject to policy in force, Sum Assured and vested bonus will be paid to the legal heir or beneficiary of the insured.

listitem.text: • Minimum Entry Age: 16 Years
• Maximum Entry Age: 65 years
• Minimum Policy Term: 5 Years
• Maximum Policy Term: 30 Years
• Minimum Sum Assured: Rs. 50,000
• Maximum Sum Assured: No Limit
• Maximum Maturity Age: 70 Years
• Premium Paying Term: Single or 5 / 10 / 15 / 20
• Premium Payment Frequency : Yearly, Half Yearly, Quaterly & Monthly
Maturity Benefit: Full Sum Assured plus Bonus
Death before maturity: Basic Sum Assured plus Vested Bonus

• Flexibility to add in riders like Accidental death benefits and permanent total disability in case of an unfortunate event of death of disability during policy enforce period, additional benefits will be paid as covered by ADB. All future premiums will be waived and monthly benefit will be paid to

• Critical Illness (CI) – This is optional rider coverage which shall be allowed to take our existing policyholders in the condition of medical fitness with effect from the policy anniversary date in all the product portfolio. However, the Company has sole discretion to accept or reject the application. The medical cost shall be borne by an applicant whatsoever. The maximum rider sum assured shall be NPR. 25,00,000 or actual basic sum assured whichever is lower.

• Personal Accident (PA) – This is optional rider coverage which offers immense benefits during the policy period. This rider shall be allowed to take new policy holder as well as existing policy holders with effect from the policy anniversary date by paying additional rider premium. The maximum rider sum assured shall be NPR. 50,00,000 or actual basic sum assured whichever is lower

data.title: Himalayan Surakshit Bhavisya Jeevan Beema Yojana ( Pension Plan)
data.subtitle: This policy  provides combine benefit of endowment policy, whole life and annual pension after premium paying term.
data.interest: Himalayan Surakshit Bhavisya Jeevan Beema Yojana ( Pension Plan)

Details.interest: Himalayan Surakshit Bhavisya Jeevan Beema Yojana ( Pension Plan)
Details.title: Himalayan Surakshit Bhavisya Jeevan Beema Yojana ( Pension Plan)
Details.subtitle: Key Features
Details.paragraph: This policy  provides combine benefit of endowment policy, whole life and annual pension after premium paying term.

listitem.text: • Minimum Entry Age: 16 Years
• Maximum Entry Age: 60 years
• Maximum Maturity Age: 70 years
• Minimum Policy Term: 10 Years
• Maximum Policy Term: 30 Years
• Minimum Sum Assured: Rs. 500,000
• Maximum Sum Assured: Unlimited as per income source
• Accrued bonus at maturity
• On death of life assured during premium paying term: Full sum assured plus accrued bonus will be paid to the nominee.
• On death of life assured after premium paying term: Full sum assured will be paid to the nominee.
• On surviving after premium paying till 99 years of age: 6 % of Sum assured per annum and at the age of 100 years or death sum assured will be paid.
• Loan facility
• Tax benefits
• Premium Waiver
• Accidental Death Benefit
• Monthly Income Benefit
• Permanent Total Disability Benefit
• Accidental Death benefits(ADB): (Equal to basic sum assured or maximum NPR. 50,00,000 which ever is less)
• Total Permanent Disability and Premium Waiver (TPD/PW): (Equal to basic sum assured or maximum NPR. 50,00,000 which ever is less)

data.title: Himalayan Life Pension Plan
data.subtitle: Himalayan Life Pension Plan is a pension product that provides the security after active work-life. You have an option to choose two ways to get your pension for your life time.

Details.title: Himalayan Life Pension Plan
Details.subtitle: Key Features
Details.paragraph: Himalayan Life Pension Plan is a pension product that provides the security after active work-life. You have an option to choose two ways to get your pension for your life time.

data.title: Himalayan Group Term Assurance Policy
data.subtitle: Provides for payment of sum insured in the event of death of the assured at any time during the enforcement policy term. If insured survives, nothing is payable. The premiums collected represent the premium for the death risk only.

listitem.text: • Term: 1 Year
• Maximum S.A: 50,000/-
• Entry Age: 16 to 64 Years
• Maximum Maturity Age: 65 Years
• Mode of Payment: Yearly
• Minimum member in Group: 25
• Policy Mature Benefit: Nil
• Death Benefits: Within Term Period - Sum Assured only.
• Riders are not applicable in this plan.
